name: Walnut Hand Mirror - Hand Carved
description:
Hand Carved Walnut Mirror 

Hand Carved Walnut Mirror with Solid Walnut Back.
Rococco Design with a Satin Finish. 

Approx 330cm Length, 200cm Wide (at widest point.)

Please note colours and imperfections may vary to the images shown on your screen, we make every effort to ensure that our products are accurately described by both text and photograph, if unsure please do not hesitate to contact us via the 'Contact Us,' page.

Each product is handmade and therefore unique.

All Items are sent via recorded delivery within the UK. Rest of the world is via "Signed For," delivery. 

If you have any special commission requests please do not hesitate to contact us via the 'Contact Us,' page.

name: Flying Across the Eras - Machine Embroidery Wall Piece
description: W 26.5cm by H 26cm Hannah was inspired to create this unique piece by her photography of silk screens in India. The intricate designs of the silk screens dating back to the 1920s were among many other beautiful pieces which detracted from the workmanship in these tiny designs. Here Hannah has simplified the design and made it her own in a simple yet beautiful piece.

name: Cream and Gold Hand Mirror - Hand Carved
description:
Hand Carved Cream and Gold Mirror

Hand Carved Cream and Gold Mirror with Solid Back. 
Rococco Design with a painted cream finish, accented by a gold stippling finish.

Approx 330cm Length, 200cm Wide (at widest point.)

name: Wild and Twisted - Free hand machine embroidery wall piece
description: W 20cm by H 21.5cm This unique wall piece was inspired by the intricacy of pattern and design captured in Hannah's photography during her research trip across both India, Thailand and New Zealand. The differences within these cultures and the designs that she photographed all fed in to the Wild and Twisted design, producing a beauty and intricacy in a simple form

name: Hand Carved Jewellery Box
description: Hand Carved Jewellery Box, with handmade fabric lining, each design is different, please get in touch if you would like to choose your design.

name: Traveling Sketchbook 3 - Hand Embroidered Wall Piece
description: W 18cm by H 22cm. This unique hand embroidered piece has been inspired by Hannah's own photographic work during some of her more extensive research trips. The one of a kind piece has been stretched across a wooden frame once the hand embroidery was completed.
